1117940.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST - Character Set: Rivals
1117940.description:
This set of DLC characters contains the rival characters from "Mighty No. 9," "Azure Striker Gunvolt," and "Gal*Gun 2."
This content adds "RAY," "Copen," and "Kurona" to the roster of playable characters.

RAY
A mysterious female-model robot.
Her unique status drains her health but lets her recover by attacking enemies. She can dish out massive damage with her close-range claw attacks!

Copen
A young man who uses science to eradicate those with superpowers known as Adepts.
He brings his combat pod "Lola" who can attack simultaneously with his main weapon!

Kurona
A demon-in-training with a dirty mouth.
She can unleash her demon power to pierce enemy shields and rain down pain from above with her spear drop!
1117940.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
